RESOURCE.STRING: There was an error adding items to the list.
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26100</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal application error occurred. IDispatch failure occurred.</Description><Suggestion>Close and restart INSITE.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26101</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal application error occurred while communicating with the user interface.</Description><Suggestion></Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26102</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while retrieving the Usage Counter interface from the Tool Security services</Description><Suggestion></Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26103</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while retrieving the Usage Counts from the Tool Security services</Description><Suggestion></Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26105</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while initializing interface pointers to display the window</Description><Suggestion></Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26111</ErrorNumber><Description>Error attempting to communicate with the ECM</Description><Suggestion>Check INLINE adapter and cables, verify key switch is in the ON position, verify power to the ECM, verify that no computer conflicts exist, retry the operation or close and restart INSITE. If the problem persists, please record the error number and contact the local distributor</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
INSITE is ready to remove the ECM passwords from the connected module. Please click Yes to continue.
Please select an item in the list!
ECM Password Removal Functionality Passwords enable a set number of ECM Password Removal Counts in INSITE. To obtain a password, you will need to contact a local distributor.
ECM Password Removal Using Last Count
The last ECM Password Removal Count will be used. Please click OK to continue. To obtain additional ECM Password Removal Counts, please contact a local distributor.
The last OEM, ECM Password Removal Count will be used. Please click OK to continue. To obtain additional OEM, ECM Password Removal Counts, please contact a local distributor.
The passwords have been successfully removed.
Action: Waiting 30 seconds before allowing for Key On
Please turn the Key Switch on, and then click OK

The password detected is not for ECM Password Removal.
Please check the password and try again. If problem persists, please contact a local distributor for assistance.
ECM Password Removal - Wrong Feature Password
Unable to add usage counts for ECM Password Removal.
Error while creating the property sheet to add usage counts for ECM Password Removal.
Error while accessing an interface to create the Options dialog.
Error while adding the page for ECM Password Removal Usage Counts in the Options dialog.
There are no passwords to remove. This could be a problem with the datafile used.

The password that was entered is invalid.
Please check the password and try again. If problem persists, please contact a local distributor for assistance.

The password detected has already been used.
Please check the password and try again. If problem persists, please contact a local distributor for assistance.
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26113</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while resetting a password</Description><Suggestion>Error while resetting the Master password</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26114</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while resetting a password></Description><Suggestion>Error while resetting the OEM password</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26115</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while resetting a password</Description><Suggestion>Error while resetting the Master password</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26116</ErrorNumber><Description>Error while resetting a password</Description><Suggestion>Error while logging on using the password that was just reset</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

INSITE has determined that there are insufficient ECM Password Removal counts available to reset all module passwords. INSITE will not reset any ECM password. To obtain additional ECM Password Removal Counts, please contact a local distributor.
OEM, ECM Password Removal Insufficient Counts

INSITE has determined that there are insufficient OEM, ECM Password Removal counts available to reset all module passwords. INSITE will not reset any ECM password. To obtain additional OEM, ECM Password Removal Counts, please contact a local distributor.
To perform this operation, the tool will need to disconnect from the ECM.Please make certain that all desired changes have been saved in the ECM. Continue?
Passwords cannot be set or reset while the engine is running. Please shut down engine and restart the addin.
The ECM could not reset the password(s). Please reconnect to module and try again. If this problem persists, contact a local distributor.ECM Response Code :
